resources.string:
This app shares basic device information with your family dashboard:

• Battery level
• Free storage space
• Optional location (requires permission)
• Device status updates

What this app DOES NOT do:
• No stealth or hidden features
• No remote control
• No keylogging
• No camera or microphone access

You will always see a notification when sharing is active. You can uninstall or stop sharing at any time.

By proceeding, you give explicit consent to share this information.
I have read and agree to share my device information
Location sharing is optional. When enabled, your approximate location will be shared with the dashboard. A notification will always be visible.
